text: thumb Claude Bodin (born May 15, 1952 in Versailles) is a member of the National Assembly of France and represents the Val-d'Oise department. He is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Versailles Category:Republican Party (France) politicians Category:Liberal Democracy (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Claude Bodin
